mobiles.name: acolyte cleric
mobiles.long_description: An acolyte of Overlord Frag is here, grinning at you.
mobiles.description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: blob
mobiles.long_description: The blob is here, waiting to eat you up.
mobiles.description:
He is big, he is bad.  You don't want to fight him when he isn't chained up.
Perhaps now would be a good time to flee from him!!!  If you don't flee, you
would really suffer the consequences.

mobiles.name: monster
mobiles.long_description: There is a monster leashed here.
mobiles.description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

mobiles.name: monster wimpy
mobiles.long_description: There is a wimpy monster leashed here.
mobiles.description:
He looks wimpy.  You feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

mobiles.name: monster aggressive
mobiles.long_description: There is an aggressive monster leashed here.
mobiles.description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

mobiles.name: monster wimpy aggressive
mobiles.long_description: There is a wimpy aggressive monster leashed here.
mobiles.description:
He looks mean, but you feel comfortable that you can kill him, especially since
he is leashed up, and you are not.

mobiles.name: big creature
mobiles.long_description: There is a big creature hulking over your form.
mobiles.description:
He looks mean, and you just might have a small problem killing him, but he
looks like a great prize!!!

mobiles.name: adept cleric
mobiles.long_description: An adept of Overlord Kahn is here, contemplating your progress.
mobiles.description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: rabbit
mobiles.long_description: A rabbit is bouncing around here.
mobiles.description: The rabbit smiles at you, completely harmless!

mobiles.name: lizard
mobiles.long_description: A lizard slithers up to you.
mobiles.description: It smiles at you, and tries to eat your leg.

mobiles.name: boar
mobiles.long_description: A boar tries to run you over.
mobiles.description: It grunts at you.

mobiles.name: fox
mobiles.long_description: A fox is here staring at you.
mobiles.description: His fur might be worth money.

mobiles.name: snail
mobiles.long_description: A snail is trying to get out of your way.
mobiles.description: You don't see much but slime about it.

mobiles.name: beast
mobiles.long_description: A beast tries to feed off of you.
mobiles.description: It looks mean.  You'd better run.

mobiles.name: bear
mobiles.long_description: A bear is here growling at you.
mobiles.description: The bear must be bigger than you!  It wants to rip your head off.

mobiles.name: wolf
mobiles.long_description: A wolf is here snarling at you.
mobiles.description: The wolf doesn't want to be bothered.

mobiles.name: adept cleric
mobiles.long_description: An adept of Frag is here, grinning and selling you things.
mobiles.description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: adept cleric
mobiles.long_description: An adept of Furey is here, training young students.
mobiles.description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: priest cleric
mobiles.long_description: The priest of Hatchet is ready to help you practice.
mobiles.description: He is big and bad.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: beast
mobiles.long_description: The hideous diploma beast is here, holding your graduation present!
mobiles.description:
This horrible creature is your final test for mud school.  Kill him, and the
diploma is yours.

mobiles.name: guardian
mobiles.long_description: The Guardian of newbies is here to help you.
mobiles.description:
The Guardian is here to help you, he well versed in the basics of 
adventuring. 

If you have any questions feel free to ask, ill do my best to help.
I is also knowlegable on areas for new adventurers like
yourself   ...Maybe you should ask him about the smurf village, the 
gnomes, the shire, or the dwarven drop-off centre?

objects.name: mace
objects.description: You see a sub issue mace here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a mace of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: dagger
objects.description: You see a sub issue dagger here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a dagger of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

You see a sword of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a vest of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Stamped on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: shield
objects.description: You see a sub issue shield here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a shield of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a cloak of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a helmet of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.short_description: a pair of sub issue leggings
objects.description: You see a pair of sub issue leggings here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see leggings of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: boots
objects.short_description: a pair of sub issue boots
objects.description: You see a pair of sub issue boots here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see boots of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: gloves
objects.short_description: a pair of sub issue gloves
objects.description: You see a pair of sub issue gloves here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see gloves of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: sleeves
objects.short_description: a pair of sub issue sleeves
objects.description: You see a pair of sub issue sleeves here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see sleeves of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: cape
objects.description: You see a sub issue cape here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a cape of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: belt
objects.description: You see a sub issue belt here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a belt of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: bracer
objects.description: You see a sub issue bracer here.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see a bracer of great but cheap craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
Merc Industries

objects.name: key
objects.description: You see a very important key here!

objects.name: diploma
objects.description: You see a mud school diploma here.

extra_descr_data.description:
This document shows that you have graduated from Mud School.
It also has magical effects on your abilities if you hold it!

Hatchet the Silver Knight
Merc Industries

objects.name: banner
objects.description: A war banner is on the floor here.

extra_descr_data.description: This is the official Merc war banner to see you through the darkest realm!

rooms.name: Entrance to Mud School
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to the Merc Mud School.  Go north to go through mud
school.  If you have been here before and want to go directly to the arena,
go south.
         type HELP BACKUP       .... it is VERY important!!!!!!

exits.description: You see the doorway into the Mud School Building.
You see the one way door into the Arena of Mud School.
You see the Temple of Midgaard.

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Consider command allows you to compare yourself to an
	opponent, very usefull in assesing theirr strengths and weaknesses'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian spits 'That kind of language won't help you here peasant!.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Gods and Deities oversee the running of the mud, if you have a problem
	relating to your clan, see YOUR clan deity first, if your problem is more serious
	you may see a GOD online or contact the mud admin/gods by email, the adresses are on
	the wizlist, type wizlist to view it.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Vampires are an essential part of this mud, its based primarily on them
	as a human you cannot become one, you must be an avatar, but you must also meet the
	clan requirements set by the leader for whichever clan you wish to join, leaders have
	total discretion about who they embrace or don't, so impress them if you wish to
	join with them.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'This _IS_ a PK mud, as a mortal you are safe, once you avatar (say
	avatar for info) you are open to attempts at player killing on you.  Do not whine
	endlessly if this happens, its all part of the game, learn from it, find your mistake
	or use it as inspiration to work harder to build up and avange the attack!'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'The mud auto-saves your charactor every few minuits (only after you 
	have 5 mob kills), but there is the backup command also, YOU are responsible for 
	using this, it makes a copy your of your player-file (your charactor)to a backup
	directory in case you ever get an error, if this occurs you can quickly and easily
	get your charactor back, if you FAIL to use this command and get a problem, there
	is very little we can do for you ... you have been warned.  We reccomend you backup
	every time you finish a mud-session, i.e every time you play do it at least once.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Claim/call commands allow you to claim equipment as your own and to
	simply 'call' it to your self at any time if you lose it, claim item, and call all
	are the syntax to do this, claiming costs 500 exp per item and calling is free.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'We have a fully automated quest system here, type quest for prices for
	each option, and see help quest for further details.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'You can become an Avatar, it has its benifits and its drawbacks. As an 
	Avatar you are open to being player killed (say playerkilling for info) you can be 
	attacked and other wise affected by any other player in the game as an Avatar, so
	think carefully before doing it.  You also cannot be killed, you go to -10 hp
	instead of dying, and slowly heal up.  You may also use the chat channel. Finally
	as an Avatar you may quest(say quest for info).'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'You will see people chatting, its a public channel for communication,
	by public we mean everyone hears whatever you chat.  As a mortal, which you are now
	you cannot chat, you may only chat once you become an Avatar. Ask me more about being
	an Avatar by saying Avatar.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'If you ever see "someone says" or the like, it is because the person
	in question is shrouded by invilibility, a spell or potion will allow you to see
	invisibly players, mobs and objects.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Your AC or armour class represents how well protected you are against
	physical assaults by armour worn on your body.It is effective down to -550ac'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'You damroll represents your ability to do damage to a mob or player
	after you sucessfullt land a blow, the higher it is, the more damage you will 
	inflict.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Your hitroll represents your ability to hit another player, the
	greater your hitroll the better chance you have of landing each blow in combat.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Move points are your charactors stamina and physical ability to
	move over distances at one time, as a mortal, these decrease with each step
	you take.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Mana is your magical energy, you use it to cast spells against
	mobs or players, and yourself.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'These represent your capacity to take physical damage in combat
	they are your health, when they are gone, you die! so be ware.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Score command give you a list of all your current stats.
	It contains all vital stats which represent your charactors attributes.
	Take 5 minuits to familiarise yourself with them.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'To get to the dwarven drop-off centre from recall,'.
The guardian says 'Go 2 south, 6 east, 1 down, then go south.'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'To get to the shire from recall,'.
The guardian says 'Go 2 south, 5 west, and then keep going north.'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'To get to the gnome village from recall,'.
The guardian says 'Go 2 south, 5 east, and then go south.'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'To get to the smurf village from recall,'.
The guardian says 'Go 2 south, 3 west, and keep going north!'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian says 'Just go west for the newbie zones'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian says 'First you should go north through mud school.'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian says 'type hints for more help.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian says 'Ok $n , but you'll need to be more specific.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Hint topics available are : someone, chat, 
	avatar, claim, quest, hp, hitroll, damroll, mana, move,
	ac, backup, score, playerkilling, vampires, gods, deities,
	and con.'
The guardian says 'Whichever one you wish to know more about, just
	say the word, e.g say backup.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Hello there $n, can I be of service?.'
The guardian says 'For a list of handy hints just say "hints".'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: The guardian says 'You are welcome, $n'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output:
The guardian says 'Welcome $n. You now have the basics of mudding'
The guardian says 'You may go down to town and enter the main game
                   or west in to the newbie area (reccomended).'
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The exits are west and south.  A small plaque is on the
wall.

exits.description: You see a path into another room.
You see a path into another room.

extra_descr_data.description:
Equipment check time!  Type 'EQUIPMENT' to see your current equipment.  Right
now, you have just a vest, a shield, and a weapon.  As you go through Mud
School you will acquire a complete set of equipment.

To pick up items on the ground as you see them, type 'GET item'.
To wear a piece of armor, type 'WEAR item'.
To hold a light source, type 'HOLD item'.
To wield a weapon, type 'WIELD weapon'.
To wear, hold, and wield everything you have, type 'WEAR ALL'.
To stop using a piece of equipment, type 'REMOVE item'.
Finally, to see the items in your inventory, type 'INVENTORY'.

When you are ready to continue, go west.

This zone (Mud School) is created by Hatchet for any Merc Mud.
Copyright 1992, 1993.

rooms.name: The Center Room
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  Exits lead in ALL directions.

exits.description: You see the room north that will lead you to the next section.

extra_descr_data.description:
This is the direction practicing room.  The directions you can go in any
room are: north, south, east, west, up, or down.  Of course, not all rooms
have all exits available.

To see the obvious exits in a room, type 'EXITS'.

Sometimes doors are closed, or locked, or secret.  Then you have to notice
clues in the room description, or try going into that direction and seeing
if you bump into a door.

Try going into each direction from here.  When you are done, go NORTH.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  Exits lead north and south.

exits.description: You see the next station ahead.

extra_descr_data.description:
Since you are here, let us have another lesson.  You can see the statistics on
yourself by typing 'SCORE'.  Do that right now.  At higher levels, 'SCORE'
gives you more information.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The only exit is east.

extra_descr_data.description: Just go east to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The only exit is north.

extra_descr_data.description: Just go north to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The only exit is up.

extra_descr_data.description: Just go up to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The only exit is down.

extra_descr_data.description: Just go down to the central room.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  Exits reach west and down.

exits.description: You see the next station of Mud School.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to combat training.

The first lesson is knowing whom to fight.  Use the command 'CONSIDER' to
consider killing a monster.  Avoid fighting monsters that will kill you
easily.

The second lesson is running away.  There is a monster in the room down.
He is too strong for you to kill, but he won't kill you.  So go 'DOWN' from
here, then 'CONSIDER' him, then 'KILL' him.  After a while, type 'FLEE' to
escape from him.

You can also set your character to flee automatically with the 'WIMPY' command.
Type 'HELP WIMPY' to find out more about 'WIMPY'.

After you flee, you will be back in this room.  When you are ready to go on
to the next station, go 'WEST'.

rooms.name: The Blob Cage
rooms.description:
You are in a smelly cage.  Strangely, the walls are still clean!
You see a sign here.  The only exit is up.

exits.description: You see a safe room up.

extra_descr_data.description:
Remember, don't fight the blob to the finish!  Just type 'KILL BLOB', then
when you are fighting, type 'FLEE', until you flee and are out of here.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.

exits.description: You see the next station of Mud School.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to the next station.  Here, you will actually fight real monsters,
without fleeing!  Kill every mob, since they hold some equipment you need.
To start, go down.

rooms.name: The Cage Room
rooms.description:
You are in the cage room.  All around are 4 cages.  Light fluoresces off the
ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a big sign on the wall.
Exits lead into the cardinal directions plus down.

exits.description: You see the aggressive monster inside!
You see the unmodified monster inside!
You see the wimpy monster inside!
You see the aggressive wimpy monster inside!
You see the next station below.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to the cage room.  The adepts of mud school have captured some
monsters for you to kill.  In the four cages are four monsters of various
types.  Kill them all!

After you kill each monster, get all of the equipment from their corpses
with the command 'GET ALL CORPSE'.  You can then use the command 'WEAR ALL'
to wear your newly won equipment.

When you are done with the corpse, 'SACRIFICE CORPSE' to give it to your God.
God will reward you for this.

Between combat, you may need to rest or sleep to regenerate hit points.
You can 'REST' to regenerate hit points, or you can 'SLEEP'.  'SLEEP' will
refresh you faster than 'REST', but you will be less aware of your
surroundings.

rooms.name: A Cage
rooms.description:
You are in a cage.  Blood and gore are everywhere.  The keepers must be lax
in the upkeep here!  There is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is south.

extra_descr_data.description:
There is an aggressive monster in this room.  Kill him and get out of here
fast!  Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

rooms.name: A Cage
rooms.description:
You are in a cage.  Blood and gore are everywhere.  The keepers must be lax
in the upkeep here!  There is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is east.

extra_descr_data.description:
There is a wimpy, aggressive monster in this room.  Kill him and get out of
here fast!  Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

rooms.name: A Cage
rooms.description:
You are in a cage.  Blood and gore are everywhere.  The keepers must be lax
in the upkeep here!  There is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is north.

extra_descr_data.description:
There is a wimpy monster in this room.  Kill him and get out of here fast!
Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

rooms.name: A Cage
rooms.description:
You are in a cage.  Blood and gore are everywhere.  The keepers must be lax
in the upkeep here!  There is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is west.

extra_descr_data.description:
There is a monster in this room.  Kill him and get out of here fast!
Remember to loot and sacrifice the corpse.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  Find your own exit here.

exits.description: You see the next station of Mud School.

extra_descr_data.description:
By now, you must be hungry and thirsty.  Time to buy groceries!
To the south is a store.  Inside the store, you can use these commands:

    BUY    Buy an item
    LIST   List what is for sale

After buying some food and drink, you can 'EAT' and 'DRINK' it.

After that, find the next exit yourself.

rooms.name: The Store in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a cramped room.  Stacked neatly on shelves everywhere are items
and packages.  Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of
course, there is a sign on the wall.  The only exit is north.

exits.description: You see the only exit out of here.

extra_descr_data.description:
The sign reads:

   Buy   - Buy something from the storekeeper.
   List  - The storekeeper will tell you what's for sale.
   Value - The storekeeper will tell you how much he will give to you for
           that item.
   Sell  - Sell that item to the storekeeper.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a square white room.  The walls are all blank, with no windows.
Light fluoresces off the ceiling in soft white tones.  Of course, there is a
sign on the wall.  The exits are north and west, with a door to the east.

exits.description: You see a darkened room inside.
You see the next station of Mud School.
You see the room you just came from.

extra_descr_data.description:
North of you is a dark room.  I hope you still have the lantern!  If not,
you have to back to the store and buy one.

In the room is a monster with a key that you need.  After killing the
monster and getting the key, come back here, UNLOCK EAST, OPEN EAST,
and continue east.

rooms.name: The Darkened Room
rooms.description:
This room was purposefully darkened so that you would need to hold on to a
light source to go through.  The walls are, of course, blank, and white.
The only exit is south.

exits.description: You see the room that you have come from.

rooms.name: The End of Mud School!
rooms.description:
This is a very bright room, with a marble pedestal in the center.  Behind
the pedestal stands a person cloaked in Silver.  Tapestries flow from every
wall, and you feel very happy to be here right now.  There is a big sign here.
The only exit is on the other side of the gate north of you.

extra_descr_data.description:
You have graduated from Mud School!  Get your diploma.  Go 'NORTH' from here
to visit our arena.  There are plenty of low-level monsters, but DON'T attack
other players.

If you want to go directly back to the temple at any time, type 'RECALL'.

After you raise to level two, you can 'SAVE' your character.  Your character
will be automatically SAVE'd every few minutes.

If you need more help during the game, type 'HELP'.  If you see something
wrong or have comments, use 'BUG', 'IDEA', or 'TYPO' to report them.

May your visit here be ... mercenary.

rooms.name: South Wall of Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the Arena.  Remember, if you wish to get out of this Arena, just
go up.  Ceilings can barely be seen in this huge Arena.  You feel as if you are
being watched by some divine being.

rooms.name: South Wall of Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the Arena.  Remember, if you wish to get out of this Arena, just
go up.  Ceilings can barely be seen in this huge Arena.  You feel as if you are
being watched by some divine being.

rooms.name: Center of Arena
rooms.description:
You are in the Arena.  Remember, if you wish to get out of this Arena, just
go up.  Ceilings can barely be seen in this huge Arena.  You feel as if you are
being watched by some divine being.  There is a BIG SIGN here.

exits.description: You see a dark murky dungeon below.

extra_descr_data.description:
Those with high bravery or low senses of cautiousness might wish to go below
to the Dungeon.  However, know that there are aggressive monsters down there,
and there is no quick escape back out of here when you are in the dungeon.

go up.  Ceilings can barely be seen in this huge Arena.  You feel as if you are

being watched by some divine being.

rooms.name: The Center of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are in the center of a large room.  A faint light from above shows that
the floors are all covered with slime.  A feeling of dread comes over you as
you notice that this is NOT a great place to go.  Exits go in all directions.
Of special note is the one that brings you back up!!!

rooms.name: The North West Corner of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are against a wall in the dungeon.  It is quite dark here.  The lack of
any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

rooms.name: The North Wall of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are against a wall in the dungeon.  It is quite dark here.  The lack of
any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

exits.description: You see the north east corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the north west corner.

rooms.name: The North East Corner of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are against a wall in the dungeon.  It is quite dark here.  The lack of
any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

rooms.description:
You are against a wall in the dungeon.  It is quite dark here.  The lack of
any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

exits.description: You see the north west corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the south west corner.

rooms.name: The East Wall of the Dungeon
rooms.description:

any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

exits.description: You see the north east corner.
You see the south east corner.
You see the center of the dungeon.

any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

exits.description: You see the center of the dungeon.
You see the south east corner.
You see the south west corner.

rooms.name: The South East Corner of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are against a wall in the dungeon.  It is quite dark here.  The lack of
any windows in the area explains the smell around you.

rooms.name: A Room in Mud School
rooms.description:
You are in a room in Mud School.  Pastels cover these walls, due to Hatchet's
mood for the day.  To the west is Furey's Training Room, and to the east is
Hatchet's Guild Room.  North of you is the next Station of Mud School.
There is a sign on the wall (type 'LOOK SIGN' to read it).

exits.description: You see the next station of Mud School.
You see Hatchet's Guild Room.  Go there to practice your skills.
You see the entrance to Mud School.
You see Furey's Training Room.  Go there to train your attributes.

extra_descr_data.description:
To find out your attributes, type 'score'.  You can improve your attributes
in Furey's Training Room to the west.  You can practice your skills and spells
in Hatchet's Guild Room to the east.  You can continue through mud school by
going north.

If you are a new character, you should go 'WEST' from here, train your
abilities, and then come back here and go 'NORTH'.

rooms.name: Furey's Training Room
rooms.description:
You are in Furey's Training Room.  Around you are all sorts of physical
and mental training tools.  The whole room is filled with magic, holiness, 
and sweat.  There is a sign on the wall.

exits.description: You see the room you came from, and the room you should go to.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to Furey's Training Room.  Here you can train your attributes.  To 
train an attribute, you need enough practices.  To find out how many practice
sessions you have, type 'train' while you are in this room.  To train for a 
specific attribute, type 'train <attr>' where attr is the first 3 letters of
the attribute you want increased.  Type 'help train' for more information.

rooms.name: Hatchet's Guild Room
rooms.description:
You are in a room filled with weapons, books, and many combat dummies, some
cut and stabbed many times, others burnt to a crisp.  The room is filled with
sweat and an aura of magic.  There is a sign on the wall.

exits.description: You see the room you came from and the room you should go to.

extra_descr_data.description:
Welcome to Hatchet's Guild Room.  Here you will learn your skills and spells.
To find out what skills and spells you can practice and how many practice
sessions you have, type 'practice'.  To practice the specific skill, type
'practice <skill>', where 'skill' is the skill or spell you wish to practice.
Practicing increases the amount you know of that skill or spell, up to a
certain maximum.  When you have practiced all you wish to practice, go west.

rooms.name: A Safe Room
rooms.description:
You are in a safe room, away from all the mean rabbits and snails of the Arena.
You can rest here, and go up to go back to the Temple of Midgaard.

exits.description: You see the Temple of Midgaard.
